product_name: The North Face Elkhorn -20 Sleeping Bag
long_description: An efficient mummy bag but with room to stretch, The North Face Elkhorn -20degF synthetic sleeping bag is a great choice for cold-weather camping. Heatseeker(TM) insulation offers a great warmth-to-weight ratio, is highly compressible and is extremely durable, making it ideal for cold weather. Ripstop nylon shell is lightweight and durable, and offers silky softness that enhances the insulation's loft; silky nylon lining feels soft next to your skin. Offset, layered construction prevents cold spots and creates consistent warmth. Vaulted footbox allows natural foot movement and eliminates excess lateral space, increasing thermal efficiency to keep your feet warm and comfortable. User-friendly features: adjustable hood and chest drawcords, easy-grab zipper pull tabs and zippered internal chest pocket. Full-length draft tube backing the zipper keeps the warmth in and the cold out. The North Face Elkhorn -20degF sleeping bag includes a stuff sack.
short_description: An efficient mummy bag but with room to stretch, The North Face Elkhorn -20degF synthetic sleeping bag is a great choice for cold-weather camping.
